title: Didn`t take any Honor Rewards yet
body: I`m a level 4 honor from 4 days ago , yet I didn`t take any single capsule yet , and in 9 days i took only 2 keys , t least every game i Take on honor or 2 ,what should I do to take some rewards ?

replies.body: Key fragments have a limit of around 12 per 28 days per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  The rate slows down a bit though the more you collect them, until the reset.  Keep playing, and it will drop for you!
